entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 1:47 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: NNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries later in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023
